execution_summary: The Docker environment was generated from replication_info.json, built successfully, and executed the planned Python replication script. The script loaded the PISA-2012 extract, cleaned and standardised data, fit five mixed-effects regressions (one for each plausible value), pooled coefficients using Rubin/Fisher rules, and exported a CSV of the five estimates plus a text summary. No code changes or dependency fixes were required; only convergence and singular-matrix warnings were noted but did not halt execution. The analysis aligned fully with the preregistered plan.

code_executed.logs: MixedLM convergence produced singular-covariance warnings but completed. Output: 'Replication analysis complete. Summary written to /app/data/final_summary.txt'.
code_executed.environment: Python 3.10 in Debian-Slim; numpy 1.24+, pandas 1.5+, pyreadr 0.4+, statsmodels 0.14+, scipy 1.10+.

results.hypothesis_tested: The interaction between school-average mathematics ability (standardised) and students’ memorisation learning strategy (standardised) will be negative in predicting students’ mathematics self-concept (standardised).

findings_summary.effect_size: R-squared not computed; coefficient ~-0.021 in SD units

tables.table_description: Coefficients, SEs, and p-values for each of the five plausible-value models.
